item.description:
Worlds End in Hingham is a beautiful location with spectacular views of Boston harbor. Let's meet in the parking lot at 11:00 am. Let's plan on bringing individual lunches and picnicing there. Bring something to sit on, ie blanket or towel. If the weather doesn't permit eating there we can go to a local restaurant in Hingham center instead. I'll update this the day before the walk when I know what the weather is gong to be like.

Carpooling is a good idea. I can fit 3 other in my car. When you rsvp indicate whether or not you need a ride .

group.name: The Chestnut Hill Walking Meetup Group

item.name: The Chestnut Hill Walking June Meeting
